show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: Venture opportunities for a regenerative Food System - Fresh Convo
subtitle: Venture opportunities for a regenerative Food System - Fresh Convo
summary:
A talk, organised by Fresh Venture Studio, on venture opportunities for a regenerative food system with Koen van Seijen as speaker. 

“What we absolutely need more of is people building things in the regenerative agriculture space. Entrepreneurial farmers, funds, investment vehicles, technology, food companies, everything we need for this revolution.” 

Topic of the talk is the organisations that need to be built for a regenerative food system. 

The talk aims to all aspiring or active entrepreneurs and other people interested in the regenerative agriculture space to share and grow their knowledge.

The Fresh Talk was organised, on October 8th, 2021, by Fresh Ventures is a startup studio focused on region agriculture and food companies based in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. 

----------------------
